name: GEORGE PAUL
top_product: All major brands like Asian paints,JSW,MRF,BirlaGrasim,Nippon,amcos, Esdee etc
ideal_referral: Architects, Builders, Applicators, People those who are thinking of painting.
top_problem_solved: One day our BNi member Mr Dineep of Deepa Electricals contacted us for an enquiry that Infopark required a particular product as per their specifications. Before contacting us, he contacted major paint companies to get that type of material. According to paint companies it is not possible to make such a veriety product and hence all companies denied that order. In that situation, we strived hard to invent a new product to solve this issue. After days of experiments and trials, we made some samples and they were satisfied very well. As a result, Mr. Dineep got a business of Rs.36Lac from Infopark and MANGALY BUILDWARE appreciated well.
my_favourite_bni_story: once when I visited an exhibition in TN, I met a business person who is running a stall there. after discussion, we recognised that both are BNi members. .Then he gave me a warm welcome with "Ponnaada".I felt that it was by being a BNi member

name: HENTRY GEORGE
top_product: MICHELIN PIRELLI YOKOHOMA BRIGSTONE GOODYEAR JK CEAT TVS
ideal_referral: My ideal referral is any car owner who values safety, smooth driving, and timely tyre care. Especially customers looking for wheel alignment, tyre replacement, balancing, rotation, or regular maintenance.
top_problem_solved: Uneven Tyre Wear – Fixing alignment & balancing issues that damage tyres. Poor Mileage – Correct tyre pressure, alignment, and tyre selection for better fuel efficiency. Vibration & Steering Pull – Eliminating wobbling, shaking, and steering drift. Frequent Tyre Damage – Recommending the right tyres based on road conditions and vehicle type. Low Tyre Life – Providing preventive tyre care to extend tyre lifespan. Unsafe Driving – Improving road grip, braking, and overall safety with proper tyre maintenance. High Cost of Tyre Replacement – Offering affordable, long-lasting tyre options to reduce expenses. Confusion in Choosing Tyres – Helping customers select the best tyre brand, size, and model for their needs. Emergency Tyre Issues – Quick solutions for puncture, air leak, or sudden tyre failure. Ride Comfort Problems – Ensuring smooth and comfortable driving by correcting suspension & tyre issues.
my_favourite_bni_story: A BNI customer once came to my shop frustrated and tired. His car used to shake at high speeds, his tyres were wearing out every 6 months, and every mechanic he visited told him a different story. He was so fed up that he said, “Bro, I am thinking of selling this car… it’s a headache.” I inspected the vehicle and immediately found the real issue — severely misaligned wheels and wrong tyre selection by his previous shop. We corrected the alignment, balancing, and guided him to the right set of tyres for his vehicle. In just 30 minutes, the car drove smoother than it had in years. Next day he called me and said: “Hentry, I feel like I got a brand new car. I am not selling it anymore.” Today he sends me every new customer he meets — his family, his colleagues, his neighbors. All from one genuine service. That is the power of proper tyre care, and that is the trust I build with every customer.
